reviewText: Malcolm McDowell is disgusting, terrifying, and absolutely riveting as the title character, EVILENKO! This russian cat-and-mouse tale is filled w/ suspense, horror, and brutality. McDowell devours his role, making every second of his screen-time uncomfortable and unsettling. Based on a true story of serial child molestation and murder, EVILENKO takes things pretty far. Not for everyone...
